Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 15th overall pick, by Houston in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2019, off Harold Buehler (WAS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2019, off Stephen Ensminger (WAS)...
Drove in 7 runs against Minnesota on 5/8/2019...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2019, hitting .375 with 10 HR, 25 RBI...
Won MVP in 2019, hitting .316 with 34 HR, 120 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2020, hitting .579 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Conference Championship with Houston in 2020...
